author: asmuts
msg: The default memory manager -- a LRU double linked list
I moved this out of the hub today.  It looks fine.
Other algorithms could be used.  It just makes a simple callback tot he hub to spoll items to disk.  This could be made more general to give the memory manager control of the hub it we wanted.
